categories: Category:Battles of the Dark Nest Crisis

nodes.text: The First Battle of Qoribu was an early battle fought between the Killiks and the Chiss Ascendancy, concerning the border dispute that took place just prior to the conflict. The conflict began when the Killiks, having been driven off their homeworld and sequestered in rather diminutive settlements, expanded their territory onto the borders of Chiss space. This unexpected move by the insectoid beings angered the Chiss Ascendancy, who began to fear that their presence would disrupt their peaceful existence. When the Killiks refused to relent on their advances, the Chiss enlisted the aid of the Galactic Alliance and the New Jedi Order to help mediate the dispute; however, when the Killiks moved to Qoribu, threateningly near their territory, attempts at reconciliation failed, and the Chiss Ascendancy declared war on the Killik hives.

To compensate for their lack of military strength, the Killiks, with the aid of former Jedi Raynar Thul, enlisted the aid of several Jedi Knights who had once known and fought with Thul during the Yuuzhan Vong War. However, despite their best efforts, both sides were unable to overcome the other, resulting in a stalemate and many casualties.
